title: 120. Miami Restaurants Closing Again! Can This Impact Other Cities?
description: In this episode of The Barron Report, host Paul Barron discusses the recent last-minute mandates by city officials to re-close Miami restaurants and bars, and how these decisions may have a ripple effect for businesses across the country.
itunes:author: Foodable Network
itunes:subtitle: In this episode of The Barron Report, host Paul Barron discusses the recent last-minute mandates by city officials to re-close Miami restaurants and bars, and how these decisions may have a ripple effect for businesses across the country.
